title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Yinyue Pian
synopsis: "Different Rabbits" absorbed the latest research results, and received the awards of Liu Feng, professor of communications at the University of Wisconsin, Richard Xu, professor of Harvard Medical School, and the famous American child development psychologist and child education expert Jim. Strong guidance from Dr. Goldfarb, famous American music producer David Xiaodiya, Master of Education in the United States, Rebecca Chen, etc. The teaching content basically covers most of the knowledge points in music enlightenment education(translated from youku)
